title: can not assign local port when use with net.DialTimeout()
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

Try to use DialTCP() to implement dial with local port
But, I found in the source tcpsock_posix.go, DialTCP() just call dialTCP() without
deadline.

So, I wish there could provide TCPDialTimeout() to call with deadline support before Go
1.1 release.  Otherwise for case which require local port assigned can not work with
deadline code.

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
16745 987b23a69416 (current tip)

Please provide any additional information below.
